trans-unit.source: Represents the method implemented by the client application to handle the event raised when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure has changed.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 이벤트를 처리 하는 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 구현 될 때 발생 나타냅니다는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 구조가 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the information in the event received by the delegate for different structure changes.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 서로 다른 구조 변경에 대 한 대리자가 받은 이벤트의 정보를 설명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |`e.structureChangeType`|`sender`|`e.runtimeId`| |-----------------------------|--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>|The child that was added.|The child that was added.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>|The parent of the child that was removed.|The child that was removed.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>|The parent of the children that were added.|The parent of the children that were added.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>|The parent of the children that were removed.|The parent of the children that were removed.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>|The parent of the children that were invalidated.|The parent of the children that were invalidated|
trans-unit.target: | `e.structureChangeType`|`sender`|`e.runtimeId`| |-----------------------------|--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>| 추가 된 자식입니다. | 추가 된 자식입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>| 제거 된 자식의 부모. | 제거 된 자식입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>| 추가 된 자식 항목의 부모입니다. | 추가 된 자식 항목의 부모입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>| 제거 된 자식의 부모. | 제거 된 자식의 부모. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>| 무효화 된 자식의 부모. | 무효화 된 자식의 부모 |</xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>
